PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04552019-05-09,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of NEIL RUSSON of Mazerolle Settlement, New Brunswick, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Gary Polonsky, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
